info.description: The British Numbers API gives you access to the largest database of UK mobile numbers available for sale. It's designed to make finding and buying numbers easy and straightforward for our partners.
info.title: British Numbers API

tags.name: Mobile Numbers
tags.description: Search and purchase mobile numbers available in the UK.

tags.name: Telephone Numbers
tags.description: Search and purchase telephone numbers available in the UK.

get.summary: Search our database of memorable mobile numbers
get.description: Explore a vast selection of memorable mobile numbers with our search feature. Tailor search queries using specific criteria to find the perfect, easy-to-remember mobile numbers for your needs.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Your search query, consisting of numbers/integers, used to find specific memorable mobile numbers

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Determines the target field for your search. By default, set to 'number', which searches across the entire mobile number for matches.

parameters.name: match
parameters.description: Specifies the match type: select 'exact' for precise matching. Without this, the search performs a fuzzy match.

parameters.name: price_gte
parameters.description: Filter by price (greater than or equal to).

parameters.name: price_lte
parameters.description: Filter by price (less than or equal to).

parameters.name: range
parameters.description: Defines the subset of results for pagination, specifying the range with a 'start-end' format. Max 100 results per query.

post.description: Submit a purchase request to buy one or more selected UK mobile numbers directly through the API.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The number(s) you wish to purchase. Multiple numbers supported by repeating the query parametre.

post.summary: Create a custom UK mobile number
post.description: Request custom or specific UK mobile numbers, offering solutions for both unique requirements and situations where preferred mobile numbers are unavailable in the /memorable endpoint. This is an asynchronous API - you will receive the available numbers within 3-5 business days via email.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Specify 6 digits to appear at the end of the desired mobile number.

price.description: Price of the mobile phone number.

last_six.description: Last six digits of the mobile phone number.

prefix.description: Prefix of the mobile phone number.
